WorkItem.Description: Checking / unchecking "normal" under bastion of twilight enables and disables both normal and heroic drops.  The "heroic" checkbox does not appear to do anything.  I found this on my enh shaman, but I assume it's the same for any class.
WorkItem.Summary: [ItemFilters] Bastion of Twilight is not working correctly

Comments.Message:
Yeah, i've been meaning to post this for a while.    It is to do with all items haveing "The Bastion of Twilight" and the filters having "Bastion of Twilight".   This results in the heroic filter looking for "Heroic Bastion of Twilight" and not finding it because the item has "Heroic The Bastion of Twilight"    

Adding a "The" to the rules for normal & heroic sub-categories of Bastion of Twilight fixes the filter.
This has already been fixed for .16
This has already been fixed for the next version of Rawr.
